title: Benvari Mountains
description: As the fight for Boran-al’s Citadel draws to a close Dave’s learned one important lesson. To protect what he cares for, he’s going to have to become stronger.  He can’t just sit back in Cliff-Hill and take things easy. Emerilia is filled with danger as well as possibilities.  It’s time Dave became a Master Smith.
author: Michael  Chatfield
